source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_1<tab>Greetings! I take it you have come to see me about a retainer.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_1こんにちは。
こちらはリテイナー雇用窓口です。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_2<tab>Retainers are hardworking lads and lasses who will help you to manage those spoils earned while off slaying dragons or whatever it is you adventurers do.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_2「リテイナー」というのは、多忙な冒険者に代わって、
荷物管理の仕事を引き受けてくれる人たちのことです。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_3<tab>Unfortunately, you do not appear you could even slay an eft, let alone a dragon, therefore I must decline any petition you may have to take a retainer into your employ.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_3申し訳ありませんが、駆け出しの冒険者の方には、
リテイナーの雇用をご案内することができません。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_4<tab>Build yourself a reputation in this city, however, and I shall provide you with whatever it is you need. Might I suggest you start by heading back to the Adventurers' Guild and seeing if someone there has work for you?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_4都市や、街の人からの依頼をこなし、
冒険者としての経験を積んでから、お越しください。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_BACK<tab>Nothing

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ABOUT_TALK_01<tab>Retainers are men and women who offer their services in exchange for coin. Though they're seldom as sharp as adventurers like yourself, they're no strangers to life's more menial tasks─tasks which your lot might not think worth your time.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ABOUT_TALK_01「リテイナー」というのは、多忙な冒険者に代わって、
荷物管理の仕事を引き受けてくれる人たちのことです。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ABOUT_TALK_02<tab>Retainers can provide a host of different services, from tending your items to protecting your gil. Oh, and you need not worry about providing recompense for a retainer's services, for the Adventurers' Guild will not only cover his salary, but also replace anything that goes missing, should you wake up to find your belongings gone and your retainer nowhere to be found.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ABOUT_TALK_02リテイナーへの賃金は、冒険者ギルドから支払われますので、
冒険者の方が負担する必要はありません。
安心して、お気軽にご利用ください。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ITEMS_GIL_TALK_01<tab>Another job retainers are often asked to perform is the tending of items placed up for sale in the markets─something many adventurers cannot be bothered to do themselves.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ITEMS_GIL_TALK_01リテイナーは、あなたの荷物やギルを預かってくれます。
また、冒険者同士の売買の場である
「マーケット」への出品も依頼できます。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ITEMS_GIL_TALK_02<tab>If you wish to experience the market for yourself, I ask that you seek out one of the nearby boards.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ITEMS_GIL_TALK_02「マーケット」について詳しく知りたければ、
すぐ側の「マーケットボード」から、
実際に利用してみるとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CALL_TALK_01<tab>Retainers in your employ can be summoned at any time using special bells like the one nearby.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CALL_TALK_01雇用したリテイナーは、「呼び鈴」で呼び出して、
荷物の整理などを行うことができます。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CALL_TALK_02<tab>Summoning bells can also be found around the realm in oft-visited locations such as city markets and inns.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CALL_TALK_02「呼び鈴」は、「マーケットボード」の近くにあります。
ほかにも宿屋など、冒険者の方がよく訪れる施設に
設置されています。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_EXPLANATION<tab>To make their markets more attractive to prospective sellers, cities will often lower the percentage of tax that is collected from each sale.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_EXPLANATION出品しているリテイナーが少ない国のマーケットでは、
出品したアイテムが売れた時に徴収している税金を減税して
出品者を優遇することがあります。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_CAUTION<tab>Reduced tax rate periods can end earlier than indicated if areas require maintenance.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_CAUTION減税の実施はメンテナンスなどで
予定より早期終了する場合があります。
ご了承ください。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_TALK_01<tab>According to our records, you may hire up to <var 20 E802 /var> retainers.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_TALK_01リテイナーの雇用ですね。
あなたが雇用できるリテイナーは、最大名です。
現在の雇用状況を確認いたしますので、少々お待ちください。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_RETAINERS_TALK<tab>Currently, you have no retainers in your employ.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_RETAINERS_TALK<tab>現在、雇用しているリテイナーはいません。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_HAVE_RETAINERS_TALK<tab>Currently, you have <var 20 E802 /var> <var 08 E4E80202 ((retainer)) ((retainers)) /var> in your employ.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_HAVE_RETAINERS_TALK<tab>現在、あなたはリテイナーを<var 20 E802 /var>人雇用しています。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CUSTOMIZE_WARNING<tab>While customizing your retainer, you will be unable to communicate with players and engage in other activities.
target:

チャットができなくなるなど
プレイヤーの行動に制限がかかることがあります。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CUSTOMIZE_TALK<tab>Excellent. We have quite a few men and women on our lists, so I invite you to describe the retainer you desire, down to the most minute detail.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CUSTOMIZE_TALKどんな人がいいですか？
まずは容姿から教えてください。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DUTY_FINDER_WARNING<tab>Beginning the retainer customization process will automatically cancel your Duty Finder registration.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DUTY_FINDER_WARNING<tab>コンテンツファインダーに参加申請している場合、このままリテイナーの手続きを進めると参加申請をキャンセルします。

target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DUTY_FINDER_CONFIRM<tab>リテイナーの手続きを進めますか？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_TALK<tab>I can think of several retainers that are exactly as you describe. Oddly enough, they have strikingly different personalities. If you would be so kind as to state a preference, it would be most helpful.
target:

次に、雇用したいリテイナーの性格を教えてください。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CHECK_PERSONALITY_ENTER<tab>Very well, I have just the individual in mind. When summoned, this retainer will greet you just so:

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Male-)I have come, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいヒューラン男-)お待たせしました。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Male-)Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなヒューラン男-)おう、来てやったぜ！？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Male-)You summoned?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なヒューラン男-)来たぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Male-)Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなヒューラン男-)はいはい、来ましたよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Male-)You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のヒューラン男-)また仕事か……

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Male-)Hello, hello! You called?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののヒューラン男-)呼んだ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Female-)At your service, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいヒューラン女-)さぁ、ご要望をどうぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Female-)What's it to be this time, love?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなヒューラン女-)アタシを呼んで、何させようってんだい？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Female-)What would you ask?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なヒューラン女-)さっさと始めましょう。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Female-)I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. So very, very sorry.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなヒューラン女-)ふぅ……何かご用でしょうか？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Female-)Quickly now, I've places to be.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のヒューラン女-)お手柔らかにね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Female-)Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののヒューラン女-)お待たせ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Male-)Yes, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? What is your bidding?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいエレゼン男-)駆け付けました。ご用をどうぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Male-)What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなエレゼン男-)貴様、くだらん用で呼んだのではあるまいな。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Male-)I have come. You may proceed.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なエレゼン男-)参上いたしました。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Male-)Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなエレゼン男-)まあ、まずはお茶でも。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Male-)I am come to conduct business, and only business.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のエレゼン男-)男は黙って、俺様参上！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Male-)You look to be in good health, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののエレゼン男-)やぁ、元気だった？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Female-)What is it you would have me do, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいエレゼン女-)呼んでくれて、ありがと。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Female-)Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなエレゼン女-)はあ～い、呼んだかしら？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Female-)Is there something that I can help you with?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なエレゼン女-)お呼び立て承った。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Female-)Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなエレゼン女-)なんでしょうかぁ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Female-)I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のエレゼン女-)きちゃった～。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Female-)You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののエレゼン女-)呼び出されるんじゃないかな～って気がしてたんだよね。
準備ばんたんだよ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Male-)Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいララフェル男-)まいど！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Male-)Greetin's and salutations, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなララフェル男-)おっす、来たよ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Male-)I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なララフェル男-)来てやったぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Male-)Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなララフェル男-)よしなに。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Male-)What?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のララフェル男-)あー、かったりー。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Male-)I'm here, I'm here!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののララフェル男-)呼ばれるの、待ってました！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Female-)Here I am, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>, as per your request.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいララフェル女-)働きますっ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Female-)'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなララフェル女-)呼んだかい？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Female-)I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なララフェル女-)何でしょう？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Female-)Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなララフェル女-)やってきましたの。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Female-)What is it now?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のララフェル女-)お願いを聞いてあげました。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Female-)Here I aaaaaam!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののララフェル女-)ご主人さま～。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Male-)How may I be of serrrvice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいミコッテ男-)ごきげんよう。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Male-)It's a war out there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You have no idea.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなミコッテ男-)待たせたなっ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Male-)...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なミコッテ男-)……何か用なのか？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Male-)Business or pleasure?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなミコッテ男-)お呼びかな？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Male-)I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のミコッテ男-)帰っていいかな……？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Male-)Just the <var 08 E905 ((fair maiden)) ((handsome fellow)) /var> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののミコッテ男-)呼んでもらって、うれしいよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Female-)I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいミコッテ女-)気合い入れて来たわよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Female-)Ye rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなミコッテ女-)ガツンと、働いてやるぜ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Female-)A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なミコッテ女-)気軽に呼ばないでよね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Female-)Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなミコッテ女-)あのぉ……もしかして呼びました……？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Female-)Ready when you are.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のミコッテ女-)とにゃ～！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Female-)I was just thinking of you!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののミコッテ女-)呼んでくれたにゃん？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Male-)What need have you of me today, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいルガディン男-)今日は、何用ですかな？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Male-)Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなルガディン男-)わはは、みんなまとめて面倒みちゃるぞ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Male-)I've come. What is it?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なルガディン男-)冒険者よ、呼んだか？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Male-)Hey there─hic─<var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((mate)) /var>! Care to join me fer a pint?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなルガディン男-)頼りにしてくれ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Male-)Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のルガディン男-)オイラに、なんか用か？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Male-)I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののルガディン男-)全力疾走！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Female-)I am at your disposal, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいルガディン女-)さぁ、始めよう。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Female-)Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなルガディン女-)何でも言いなっ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Female-)Go ahead, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なルガディン女-)フン、来てやったぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Female-)Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなルガディン女-)お手並み拝見。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Female-)This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のルガディン女-)ワタシの仕事ぶりを手本にするがいい。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Female-)So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののルガディン女-)お任せあれ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Male-)Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I be of service?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1(-明るいアウラ男-)よぉ、！
今日はどんなことをしようか！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Male-)What'll it be, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなアウラ男-)遠慮は無用、なんでも言いな！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Male-)State your business.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なアウラ男-)我輩の名を呼ぶとは……。
フッ……貴様もたいがい、命知らずなものだ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Male-)And how does this wonderful <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> find you?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなアウラ男-)やぁ、元気にしてたか？
お前さんの顔が見れて嬉しいよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Male-)Well... Here I am...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5(-問題児のアウラ男-)ったく……何の用だよ。
あんま、面倒な注文すんじゃねーぞ？

source:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6(-Lively Auri Male-)We work the market stalls,♪
And our uniforms are pretty;♪
We are sober men and true,♪
And attentive to our duties!♪
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののアウラ男-)呼ばれたそばから、即見参ッ！
我が主よ、何か良いことはあったか？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Female-)<var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. What would you ask of me?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1(-明るいアウラ女-)お呼びですか、。
ご用件を承りますね！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Female-)So. We doing this?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなアウラ女-)呼んだからには、何か用なんだろうねえ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Female-)Yes?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なアウラ女-)この私をお呼びのようね。
さあ、あなたの用件を言いなさい。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Female-)Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなアウラ女-)は～い、お変わりありませんか～？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Female-)I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のアウラ女-)ほんとに……わたしでいいの……？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Female-)What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののアウラ女-)やっほー！
なになに、わたしに会いたかったの～？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hrothgar Male-)You rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1(-明るいロスガル男-)来たぞ、。
さて、なにをご所望かな？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hrothgar Male-)I trust this will be worth my while.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2(-ワイルドなロスガル男-)……オレに用があるんだろ？
とっとと言いな、変な気ィ使うもんじゃねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hrothgar Male-)<var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なロスガル男-)俺様を呼びつけるか……。
余程の用件でなくば、許さんぞ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hrothgar Male-)Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなロスガル男-)やぁ主殿、世話になっているな。
さて今日は、何を任せてくれるのかな？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hrothgar Male-)Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5(-問題児のロスガル男-)おうおうおうおう！
呼び付けたからには、バシッと頼みを聞かせやがれッ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hrothgar Male-)It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののロスガル男-)チ～ッス！
オレのこと、呼びましたぁ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Female-)What will it be, love?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1(-明るいヴィエラ女-)ハァイ、ハニー♪
今日はアタシにどんなご用？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Female-)Your orders! I would hear them at once!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2(-ワイルドなヴィエラ女-)何の用だぁ？
今日もアツい話、よこしてくれよな！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Female-)If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なヴィエラ女-)汝、何を求むるか。
欲する望みをば、この耳に聞かせん……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Female-)Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなヴィエラ女-)はぁいぃ……ふわぁ～。
キミに呼ばれたかなぁ……それとも夢ぇ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Female-)A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5(-問題児のヴィエラ女-)どーも。
ボクに、なにか用？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Female-)I am here to do your every bidding, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Ask of me anything at all!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののヴィエラ女-)お呼びいただきましたかしら！？
わたくし、お役に立ってみせますわよ？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Male-)I have been awaiting your summons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. What would you have of me this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1(-明るいヴィエラ男-)やぁ、呼んでくれるのを待ってたよ！
今日は何を任せてくれるのかな？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Male-)What can I do for ye, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2(-ワイルドなヴィエラ男-)お疲れさまッす、！！
自分がお役に立てるっすか！？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Male-)You called, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なヴィエラ男-)ただいま、推参しました……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Male-)You─hic─rang?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなヴィエラ男-)うぃっく……
もしかして、呼んだぁ～？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Male-)Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5(-問題児のヴィエラ男-)わざわざ、オレを呼んだの？
付き合ってやるから、早く聞かせなよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Male-)You have my ear, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Both of them, in fact!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののヴィエラ男-)やぁ主さん、世話になってるね！
いやはや、今日はどういった御用向きで？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Male-)If that is all, I will take my leave now, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいヒューラン男-)次も頑張ります。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Male-)Take care o' yerself, hear?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなヒューラン男-)じゃあな！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Male-)Until we next meet.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なヒューラン男-)帰る。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Male-)Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなヒューラン男-)んじゃ、さいなら。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Male-)I believe thanks are in order.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のヒューラン男-)まあ、楽しかったぜ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Male-)I'm off, then!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののヒューラン男-)ではでは！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Female-)With your leave, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいヒューラン女-)また会う日まで。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Female-)Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなヒューラン女-)お先に。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Female-)Farewell, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なヒューラン女-)お疲れ様でした。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Female-)If there is nothing else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I'll be going now.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなヒューラン女-)さようなら。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Female-)Is that all? Very well, until next time.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のヒューラン女-)また呼んでね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Female-)Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののヒューラン女-)またね、ばいばい。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Male-)As always, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいエレゼン男-)失礼します。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Male-)You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなエレゼン男-)また会おう。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Male-)Don't be a stranger.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なエレゼン男-)後はお任せいたします。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Male-)I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなエレゼン男-)ひとやすみ、ひとやすみ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Male-)As you wish.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のエレゼン男-)いい汗かいたぜ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Male-)Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののエレゼン男-)それじゃあね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Female-)I humbly await your next summons, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいエレゼン女-)やっと帰れるわ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Female-)Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなエレゼン女-)いつでも、頼りにしなさいね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Female-)Always a pleasure.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なエレゼン女-)御免。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Female-)That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなエレゼン女-)おつかれさまでしたぁ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Female-)I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のエレゼン女-)ばいばい～。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Female-)Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののエレゼン女-)ばいびー。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Male-)Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいララフェル男-)まいどどうも！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Male-)Shouldn't take more than a moment, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなララフェル男-)じゃっあねー。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Male-)I'll be going, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なララフェル男-)さらばだ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Male-)Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなララフェル男-)おたっしゃで。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Male-)Be well.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のララフェル男-)ういーっす。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Male-)I'm off, I'm off!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののララフェル男-)出直します。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Female-)Until we meet again!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいララフェル女-)いい一日をっ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Female-)Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなララフェル女-)じゃあね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Female-)May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なララフェル女-)休ませてもらいます。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Female-)Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなララフェル女-)さようならですの。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Female-)You know how to reach me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のララフェル女-)ご機嫌よう。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Female-)Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののララフェル女-)さよなら～。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Male-)Thy will be done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいミコッテ男-)またね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Male-)The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなミコッテ男-)あばよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Male-)...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なミコッテ男-)……帰るぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Male-)Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなミコッテ男-)それじゃね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Male-)I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のミコッテ男-)当面、そっとしといてくれよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Male-)Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののミコッテ男-)また呼んでくれよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Female-)Good-bye for now, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいミコッテ女-)お先～。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Female-)Right then, let's get on with it!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなミコッテ女-)さぁて、遊ぶぞ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Female-)There is no call for concerrrn.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なミコッテ女-)寂しくなんかないわよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Female-)When the master's away, the cat will play.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなミコッテ女-)すごく疲れました……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Female-)Gods, this is tirin'...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のミコッテ女-)じゃ～にゃ～！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Female-)You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののミコッテ女-)帰っちゃうにゃん。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Male-)I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいルガディン男-)お疲れ様でした。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Male-)Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなルガディン男-)てやんでぇ、用済みってわけでぇ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Male-)I will go now.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なルガディン男-)失礼する。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Male-)Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなルガディン男-)歯磨きしてから寝ろよ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Male-)I don't do good-byes.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のルガディン男-)オイラ、帰っていいんだな。帰るぞ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Male-)Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののルガディン男-)全力で生きろよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Female-)Will that be all for today, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>? Understood.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-明るいルガディン女-)もう終わりか。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Female-)Aye, aye, cap'n!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなルガディン女-)元気でなっ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Female-)Duly noted.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なルガディン女-)やれやれ、だ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Female-)Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなルガディン女-)やっと帰れます。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Female-)Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-問題児のルガディン女-)最高の仕事ぶりだったな！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Female-)Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-お調子もののルガディン女-)お達者で。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Male-)If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1(-明るいアウラ男-)おっ、もう終いか？
なんかあったら、すぐ呼んでくれよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Male-)Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなアウラ男-)遠慮は無用、いつでも呼びな！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Male-)Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なアウラ男-)ク……ククク……
ワーッハッハッハッハッハッハッグゲッ！
ゲッゲホッ……ゲホッ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Male-)Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなアウラ男-)じゃあ、またな。
次に呼ばれるまで、茶でも淹れて待つとするよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Male-)You are finished with me, then?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5(-問題児のアウラ男-)ん、終わったぁ？
ふわ～あ……そんじゃあな。

source:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6(-Lively Auri Male-)Here today and gone tomorrow;♪
Yes, I know─♪
That is so!♪
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののアウラ男-)したらば、御免ッ！
次なる出番に備えておくからなーッハッハ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Female-)If ever you have need of me, just ring.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1(-明るいアウラ女-)それでは、いってらっしゃいませ！
良い旅路となることを、願っておりますね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Female-)Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2(-ワイルドなアウラ女-)そんじゃ、行ってきな！
冒険もいいけど、アタイのことを忘れたら承知しないよ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Female-)Right, then.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なアウラ女-)失礼するわ。
……また私を呼ぶこと、いいわね？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Female-)Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-のんびりなアウラ女-)ではでは、ご機嫌うるわしゅう～。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Female-)You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5(-問題児のアウラ女-)もう……帰っていいの？
わたしなんかで、ごめんね……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Female-)Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Very good indeed!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののアウラ女-)じゃあ、まったね～ん！
何かあったら、いつ呼んでくれてもいいよ。
気がむいたら来るからさっ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hrothgar Male-)Always a pleasure to serve, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1(-明るいロスガル男-)の力になれたなら、本望さ。
またいつでも呼んでくれ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hrothgar Male-)Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2(-ワイルドなロスガル男-)大した仕事じゃねぇや。
……また、いつでも呼べよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hrothgar Male-)<var 1A 02 /var>Good-bye<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なロスガル男-)ほかに貴様の望みを満たせる者が、
果たしてどれほどいたものか？
……また呼ぶがいい。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hrothgar Male-)And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなロスガル男-)それじゃ、失礼するよ。
さて、毛づくろいでもしようかな。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Indepedent Hrothgar Male-)Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5(-問題児のロスガル男-)……おう、そんじゃな。
ったく、いつでもズバッと呼びやがれよな！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hrothgar Male-)Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののロスガル男-)へいへ～い！
気が向いたら、また呼んでちょーよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Female-)Must we part so soon?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1(-明るいヴィエラ女-)あら、もう行っちゃうの？
また呼んでね、ハニー♪

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Female-)And I am off!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-ワイルドなヴィエラ女-)それじゃ、アバよ！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Female-)Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3(-冷徹なヴィエラ女-)請い願うことあらば、我を呼べ。
我もまた、汝とまみえんことを望もう……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Female-)That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなヴィエラ女-)んぅぅ……もうオシマイ、かな～？
オヤスミしてるから、また起こしてねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Indepedent Viera Female-)That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5(-問題児のヴィエラ女-)ボクのこと、もう帰らせちゃうんだ？
ふーん……またね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Female-)Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののヴィエラ女-)あら、もうお話は終わり？
つれないこと……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Male-)Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1(-明るいヴィエラ男-)きっとまた、力にならせてくれよ？
キミも……いってらっしゃい。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Male-)Just say the word, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>, and I'll be here with bells on.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2(-ワイルドなヴィエラ男-)のためにッてなら、
またいつでも馳せ参じるっすよ！！

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Male-)If you have no further need of my services...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-冷徹なヴィエラ男-)しからば、御免いたしましょう……。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Male-)I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4(-のんびりなヴィエラ男-)そんじゃ、また一杯やってっから！
いつでも呼んでくんなね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Male-)What─is that it? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> you need a retainer?
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5(-問題児のヴィエラ男-)なんだよ～、もう終わりぃ？
それじゃ行くけどぉ……また呼べよな。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Male-)Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6(-お調子もののヴィエラ男-)もう御用はお済みで？
そいじゃ、あっしは失礼するよ。

target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_EXPLANATION_01<tab>何について、ご説明いたしましょう？

target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_NAME_TOO_SHORT<tab>ニックネームは3文字以上にしてください。
